interrogationchair.str_desc: This is the kind of chair shitty cops use to question their victims. Sitting in it gives you war flashbacks to when you were arrested, so you'll probably only whip it out for special occasions.
interrogationchair.furniture_place_desc: You place the chair in the middle of the room, trying not to think about police.
interrogationchair.furniture_look_desc: There's an interrogation chair here for some reason.

brokenclock.str_desc: You can't believe you own and treasure a broken clock. The bazaar sells these by convincing idiotic juvies they can fix it. They can't.
brokenclock.furniture_place_desc: You hang the clock on the wall.

bevanssnot.str_desc: This stuff is actually pretty useful. It's a way to decorate your house with slime, without actually having to give up your own.
bevanssnot.furniture_place_desc: You gently smear the slime facsimile on the walls.
bevanssnot.furniture_look_desc: The walls are smeared with slime.

chair.str_desc: It's a normal wooden chair. A sign of your entry into the rat race that is the economy.
chair.furniture_place_desc: You set the chair where you think it's appropriate. How exciting.
chair.furniture_look_desc: There's a chair in the room.

desk.str_desc: A normal wooden desk. You can almost hear your soul breaking under your monotonous career.
desk.furniture_place_desc: You set up the desk in the corner of the room.
desk.furniture_look_desc: You see a desk in the corner.

couch.str_desc: This one's a pull-out couch. The upholstery is pretty new, yet somehow looks worn out already.
couch.furniture_place_desc: You get some friend or another to help you move the couch in. They pretended like they were happy to do it, but you know they weren't.
couch.furniture_look_desc: There's a comfy couch up against the wall.

lamp.str_desc: A normal lamp. Good for reading, if your juvenile delinquent ass could actually read.
lamp.furniture_place_desc: You set up the lamp, plug it in, and watch the one-light light show.
lamp.furniture_look_desc: The lamp casts a warm light throughout the room.

lgbtqdesk.str_desc: It's like a regular desk, but the drawers are all different colors of the rainbow.
lgbtqdesk.furniture_place_desc: You drag the desk into position. You feel gayer already.
lgbtqdesk.furniture_look_desc: A gaudy rainbow desk is in the corner of the room.

lgbtqchair.str_desc: A rainbow striped chair. I'll bet you could give some pretty good man-on-man lap dances with this.
lgbtqchair.furniture_place_desc: You place the chair in the best place you can think of.
lgbtqchair.furniture_look_desc: There's a rainbow chair set up.

lgbtqcouch.str_desc: There's no need for this couch to pull out.
lgbtqcouch.furniture_place_desc: You contact the Village People, and they help you move the couch in. Those guys are pretty helpful.
lgbtqcouch.furniture_look_desc: A colorful couch sits against the wall.

lgbtqlamp.str_desc: It's not actually the lamp that's LGBTQ. It's the bulb.
lgbtqlamp.furniture_place_desc: You plug in the lamp and watch the pretty colors for awhile.
lgbtqlamp.furniture_look_desc: The fancy lamp flashes rainbow everywhere.

lgbtqbed.str_desc: This is where the magic happens.
lgbtqbed.furniture_place_desc: You set up your bed, dreaming of all the same-sex poon you're gonna slam.
lgbtqbed.furniture_look_desc: There's a rainbow bed in the bedroom.

bed.str_desc: A standard-issue bed, ready-made for crying yourself to sleep.
bed.furniture_place_desc: The IKEA instructions are confusing, so it takes a few attempts to make the bed.
bed.furniture_look_desc: There's a bed in the bedroom.

hauntedbed.str_desc: This bed was owned by a long-gone staydead, way back in Season 1. You can still feel the negaslime residue on it.
hauntedbed.furniture_place_desc: You're about to place the mattress when a dozen spiders crawl out of it. Better be careful with this one.
hauntedbed.furniture_look_desc: You hear ghostly moaning from the bedroom.

hauntedcouch.str_desc: Every person who sat on this couch was supposedly cursed to die the day after. That doesn't mean much in NLACakaNM, though.
hauntedcouch.furniture_place_desc: You were going to ask some of your buds to help move this in, but you walked into the apartment and it was already there...
hauntedcouch.furniture_look_desc: The rustic couch against the wall looks old and haunted.

hauntedlamp.str_desc: When you turn on this lamp it somehow makes the room darker.
hauntedlamp.furniture_place_desc: You set up the old lamp. The light flickers.
hauntedlamp.furniture_look_desc: The lighting in here is ominous, thanks to your lamp.

hauntedchair.str_desc: This chair doesn't seem to go well with other furniture, unless it's below a noose.
hauntedchair.furniture_place_desc: You put the chair out of sight, where you won't be tempted to !suicide.
hauntedchair.furniture_look_desc: A creepy chair stands in the middle of the room.

haunteddesk.str_desc: It just looks like an old desk. What did the store clerk mean by 'haunted'?
haunteddesk.furniture_place_desc: You move the desk into the corner. Scary.
haunteddesk.furniture_look_desc: An old desk(haunted, apparently) is in the corner.

armageddonspritzer.str_desc:
You look at the automatic scent spritzer, filled to the top with a sinister red liquid. You wonder to yourself why you bought this. All of a sudden, it sprays a puff directly into your face, and you begin to hallucinate.

The light begins to fade from your eyes as you're bombarded with cacophanous mental static. The buzzing and echoey clanging drives you to scream, but your body no longer exists. You try to clutch your face in desperation and all you feel is liquid. You feel burning. Burning everywhere. The sky flashes a dissonant dark orange, as though the sun was setting on reality itself, and although nobody is speaking, you feel it all calling to you. But you don't want this. Whatever memories haven't escaped you want this all to stop. You don't know your own name and you wish to remember it. And it all hurts. It hurts so much. Please stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop.

When you wake up, your face is bleeding and 2 hours have passed. Well, shit. Guess you better prepare for when this goes off again in an hour.
armageddonspritzer.furniture_place_desc: You set up the spritzer high up on the wall. Gulp.
armageddonspritzer.furniture_look_desc: The spritzer in here makes you feel the sicknasty feelings.

beanbagchair.str_desc: A cushy chair. You were told Digibro has one just like it.
beanbagchair.furniture_place_desc: You plop the beanbag chair just wherever.
beanbagchair.furniture_look_desc: A beanbag chair is plopped just wherever.

slimebagchair.str_desc: A squishy slime-based chair. It's nice and viscous, for your tired bottom.
slimebagchair.furniture_place_desc: You plop the slimebag chair just wherever.
slimebagchair.furniture_look_desc: A bright green slimebag chair is plopped just wherever.

custombodypillow.str_desc: A dakimakura with pillowcase. It's got {custom} on it.
custombodypillow.furniture_place_desc: You gently place the pillow in your room, being careful not to damage your waifu.
custombodypillow.furniture_look_desc: There's a {custom} body pillow in the bedroom.

futon.str_desc: Every tenant's best friend. Foldable, holdable, lovable.
futon.furniture_place_desc: You get your friends to help you set up the futon. It's so light and convenient that they treat you to KFC at the end of it.
futon.furniture_look_desc: There's a futon against the wall.

vaporsposter.str_desc:
It's a poster for The Cop Killer's comic. There's Magda. Yep. 
patreon.com/bensaint
saintcomix.com
vaporsposter.furniture_place_desc: You roll out your fullbody Magda poster and place it on the wall. You wonder if it's considered a betrayal if Rowdys own these.
vaporsposter.furniture_look_desc: There's a Vapors poster on the wall.

burgerprintwallpaper.str_desc: This wallpaper is a dead ringer for that burger jumpsuit the Rowdy Fucker always wears. Just having it makes you feel rancorous.
burgerprintwallpaper.furniture_place_desc: You start by taking all your furniture out of your house. You buy a paintroller, some adhesive, and some tarp for the floor. You toil for a day sticking the adhesive and applying the wallpaper, then stay at someone else's flat for another day so it dries. And... dammit, the burgers aren't aligned correctly on the seams. Guess we'll just deal.
burgerprintwallpaper.furniture_look_desc: The walls are papered with burgers.

highclassbed.str_desc: This offensively comfortable little number is filled with grade A down feathers hand-picked by NASA. You can get such good sleep on it that it almost lets you forget your sins. Almost.
highclassbed.furniture_place_desc: You walk outside and give a stern nod to the lower-class peons running about. They give a melancholy look when they see you point to your new bed, but they know they must do as told. Four of the stronger looking street urchins hoist your bed in their arms and carry it to your abode, with you sitting atop it like the emperor you are. They set you down with the gentleness of skilled servants, and you flip them several million SlimeCoin just to get out of your sight. Boy. You can't wait to sleep on this.
highclassbed.furniture_look_desc: You glimpse the high class bed in the bedroom and feel the urge to lie down.

highclassthrone.str_desc: A golden throne adorned with red velvet. Jewel encrusted, regal, and fucking stupid expensive.
highclassthrone.furniture_place_desc: As you place the throne, you picture the kings that came before you. Marc Antony. Nero. All six Georges. Or seven, if you count Maddox. Thinking on it, you decide your reign will be different from those idiots.
highclassthrone.furniture_look_desc: You see the throne. It beckons.

highclasscouch.str_desc: It's a luxury hardwood sofa with huge gemstones in the armrests. As stiff as it looks, it's comfier than anything you've sat in before.
highclasscouch.furniture_place_desc: You hire some people to help you move your couch in. They were way too slow for your busy schedule.
highclasscouch.furniture_look_desc: A high class couch is against the wall.

highclassdesk.str_desc: They say some old politician signed a bunch of sick ass documents on this. The vendor never told you who, though.
highclassdesk.furniture_place_desc: You place the desk near a window, allowing the serfs outside to bask in your radiance.
highclassdesk.furniture_look_desc: A high class desk is in the corner.

highclasslamp.str_desc: It's a lamp. It looks just like the regular lamp, but it doesn't actually work. You got suckered, dude.
highclasslamp.furniture_place_desc: You try all sorts of light bulbs, but the lamp is just broken. You defeatedly set it up where it won't attract attention.

laptopcomputer.str_desc: It's a laptop from 2006, freshly installed with Windows XP. This thing hardly works, but when it's plugged into the wall you can still run Discord.
laptopcomputer.furniture_place_desc: You place the laptop and plug it in.
laptopcomputer.furniture_look_desc: A laptop sits closed on the floor.

rainbowdashfigurine.str_desc: It's one of those little pony figures from MLP: Friendship is Magic. It's in pretty good condition.
rainbowdashfigurine.furniture_place_desc: You set Rainbow by the windowsill, where she can daydream about taking to the skies.
rainbowdashfigurine.furniture_look_desc: You can sense brony vibes in this room.

diploma.str_desc: It's a diploma from a NLACakaNM college. You're not sure you earned this.
diploma.furniture_place_desc: You think about all the memories you had back in college: drinking, skipping class, killing everyone in University Parking Services, and maybe even a little learning along the way. You lower your head sentimentally and hang the diploma on your wall.
diploma.furniture_look_desc: A diploma hangs on the wall.

racecarbed.str_desc: VROOM VROOM! NNNNEEEEEEOOOOOOWWWWWW SKRRT! NEEEEEEEOOOOOOOOW BEEP BEEP! SCREEECH! CRASH!
racecarbed.furniture_place_desc: You assemble the bed and place it in your vroom.
racecarbed.furniture_look_desc: There's a racecar bed in the bedroom.

padlockset.str_desc: You have a standard deadbolt lock, a steel door guard, a second password protected deadbolt, one of those chain thingies, reinforced hinges, and one of those dungeon-style full-length door guards. Also a chair to prop against the door for good measure.
padlockset.furniture_place_desc: You meticulously attach your various locks to your front door until you're satisfied with the craftsmanship. Maybe now you'll finally sleep soundly at night.
padlockset.furniture_look_desc: The door is really, REALLY locked.

butler.str_desc: You don't know this man's real name, but he responds to Jeeves so you've been going with that. He does whatever you tell him to do, but for some reason he's useless at gang warfare.
butler.furniture_place_desc: You clap twice, and your butler comes running. You point to the floor in the corner. "Jeeves," you say, "You'll be sleeping here from now on." He nods, and begins to get comfy there on the cold floor.
butler.furniture_look_desc: A butler stands up straight against the wall, awaiting your instructions.

crib.str_desc: Awwww. I bet your kid looks adorable sleeping in this. You do have a kid, right?
crib.furniture_place_desc: You build the crib from the little box it came in, spinning the mobile a couple of times to make sure it works.
crib.furniture_look_desc: There's a crib in the bedroom.

unhealthylivingbook.str_name: Guide to Unhealthy Living: Cowritten by the Rift Cafe
unhealthylivingbook.str_desc: It's a book about how to transition to living a sedentary, unhygenic lifestyle in less than 20 days.
unhealthylivingbook.furniture_place_desc: You carefully study brony habit-forming patterns and embrace mediocrity. Your life slowly begins to fall apart, and the junk food you eat permeates the room and makes everything smell like piss and negaslime. You can't believe a product of the Rift Cafe actually accomplished something.

singingfishplaque.str_desc:
You press the button on the plaque. 

:notes:Here's a little tip I know:notes:
:notes:Take with !snag and store with !stow:notes:
:notes:Don't worry:notes:
:notes:Stay slimy:notes:
:notes:The little miners were upset:notes:
:notes:So they went and fished me up instead:notes:
:notes:Don't worry:notes:
:notes:Stay slimy:notes:
:notes:WEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEHEEEEEEEEEEEHEEEEEEEEEEEEEHEEHAOOHEEHEHEHOOHAHAHAAAA

Fuck, this thing is annoying. You smack it in the face before it finishes its song.
singingfishplaque.furniture_place_desc: You put a nail in the wall and hang up your fish. Slimecorp probably doesn't want you knocking holes in the walls, but fuck 'em.
singingfishplaque.furniture_look_desc: There's a fake fish mounted on the wall.

arcadecabinet.furniture_place_desc: It's been forever since you've played a real video game. Finally, the moment you've been waiting for. You plug this bitch in and gaze at its splendor.
arcadecabinet.furniture_look_desc: There's an arcade cabinet set up.

washingmachine.str_desc: It's one of those top-loading machines from ages ago. With this you can !wash <item> to remove the dye from it, but you're not sure you want to. Hygiene doesn't seem very RFCK-core.
washingmachine.furniture_place_desc: You place the washing machine in a side room. You don't really know how you managed the complex plumbing involved, but there it is.
washingmachine.furniture_look_desc: An old washing machine is hooked up in the other room.

leatherdesk.str_desc: A desk adorned with scalp leather. Looks nice and fancy, as long as you forget how it was made.
leatherdesk.furniture_place_desc: You place the desk and admire the subtle craftsmanship that was put into it.
leatherdesk.furniture_look_desc: There's a leathery desk in the corner.

leathercouch.str_desc: It's a leather couch made of human scalps. To be fair, no cow would dare set foot in this city.
leathercouch.furniture_place_desc: Moving the couch in was a huge pain. Nobody wanted to help you move it, so you had to manage yourself. Christ, it's like just having a scalp-couch makes everybody think you're a serial killer.
leathercouch.furniture_look_desc: The studded leather couch adds class to the room.

leatherbed.str_desc: It's a bed upholstered with leather. Demonstrably less comfortable than a regular bed, but you just had to.
leatherbed.furniture_place_desc: You set up the bed, slowly spreading the human scalp comforter across its sheets. This isn't as good of an idea as you remember.
leatherbed.furniture_look_desc: There's a leather bed in the bedroom.

leatherlamp.str_desc: The leather covering makes you feel a bit more western. Also the fact that you killed 3 cowpokes just to get it.
leatherlamp.furniture_place_desc: The leather is soft to the touch, giving you that extra bit of comfort as you plug it in.
leatherlamp.furniture_look_desc: The lamp is adorned with leather.

leatherchair.str_desc: A minor upgrade to the regular chair. Was this even worth it?
leatherchair.furniture_place_desc: You set the chair up. You realize you're basically sitting on your enemies' heads and giggle about it.
leatherchair.furniture_look_desc: A nice leather chair is set up.

pictureframe.furniture_place_desc: You place the picture on the wall. What did you put in there? Was it a picture of your family? I bet it was a picture of your family. Man, you suck.
pictureframe.furniture_look_desc: A picture frame hangs on the wall.

hammock.str_desc: It's a frayed rope hammock. Kinda looks like the worn-out fishing nets they use down at the piers, but it'll probably work just as well as the real deal.
hammock.furniture_place_desc: Getting this set up will be tricky. You take some industrial strength railroad spikes and drive them into each side of the wall, then use the supports to wrap the two ends until the hammock is taut. Why the fuck did you set up a hammock indoors, anyway?
hammock.furniture_look_desc: An indoor hammock is set up in the bedroom.

juggaloposter.str_desc: Violent J and Shaggy 2 Dope are depicted brutally murdering some juvie with steak knives. Their stabbing form is terrible but you can appreciate their charisma.
juggaloposter.furniture_place_desc: You don't have any tape to fasten the poster, so you end up using magnets instead. You're not sure how they work, though.
juggaloposter.furniture_look_desc: A poster on the wall depicts a Juggalo murder party.

television.str_desc: It's a CRT, a pretty big one too. A bunch of adapters are frankenstein'd up to it so it takes modern cables.
television.furniture_place_desc: You drop the TV on the floor. Your parents said this stuff turns your brain to mush, but yours is already slime, so no harm done. Time to get !watching!
television.furniture_look_desc: An old CRT is set up.

pottedplant.str_desc: It's a potted plant. Currently empty.
pottedplant.furniture_place_desc: You set the pot where plants in it could get plenty of sunlight.
pottedplant.furniture_look_desc: A potted plant is on the sill.

airmattress.str_desc: A vinyl air mattress. Perfect for sleepovers, or when the homeless crash at your place.
airmattress.furniture_place_desc: You blow a whole bunch until your floppy piece of vinyl is a bouncy piece of vinyl.
airmattress.furniture_look_desc: An air matress is blown up in the bedroom.

churchpew.str_desc: A long wooden bench they normally use in church services. To be completely honest, it looks really uncomfortable to sit in.
churchpew.furniture_place_desc: You set up the pew in your flat, just in case someone wants to hear you preach.
churchpew.furniture_look_desc: A pew is against the wall.

churchaltar.str_desc: An old-looking altar with elaborate carving on the sides. Do you do sacrifices on these?
churchaltar.furniture_place_desc: You place a fresh tablecloth, some incense, and a bible on the altar. You say a hymn to yourself before standing up to admire the handiwork.
churchaltar.furniture_look_desc: An altar is fully adorned against the wall.

churchcandles.str_desc: A 16 pack of beeswax candles and a couple brass candlesticks to go with them.
churchcandles.furniture_place_desc: You arrange the candlesticks with a pleasing symmetry. Someone less pious would call this a fire hazard, but you're determined that God won't let your house burn down.
churchcandles.furniture_look_desc: The room is dimly lit with candles.

confessionbooth.str_desc: It's a little pair of rooms you sit in to confess your sins. Living in NLACakaNM you may have a lot of those.
confessionbooth.furniture_place_desc: Once you get the booth in, you make sure it works by confessing to yourself. It does, that's good.
confessionbooth.furniture_look_desc: A confession booth has been installed here.

abstinencebed.str_desc: It's like a regular bed, but you're fastened to it to prevent any unneeded fornication. Paradoxically, that's actually sort of kinky.
abstinencebed.furniture_place_desc: You place the bed down, dreaming of all that sinful poon you're going to miss out on.
abstinencebed.furniture_look_desc: An abstinence bed is in the bedroom.

wallpaper.str_desc: It's a solid color wallpaper. Pretty plain, but dyeable.
wallpaper.furniture_place_desc: You cover the walls with wallpaper.
wallpaper.furniture_look_desc: The walls are a nice shade of -*HUE*-

applejackfigurine.str_desc: It's an MLP figure. She's a dirty southerner.
applejackfigurine.furniture_place_desc: You place Apple Jack up on the windowsill.
applejackfigurine.furniture_look_desc: You can sense brony vibes in this room.

fluttershyfigurine.str_desc: It's an MLP figure. She's a yellow pegasus, very Juvie-core.
fluttershyfigurine.furniture_place_desc: Fluttershy goes right here on the sill.
fluttershyfigurine.furniture_look_desc: You can sense brony vibes in this room.

rarityfigurine.str_desc: It's an MLP figure. This one's known for being marginally bitchier than the others.
rarityfigurine.furniture_place_desc: You set Rarity up by the window. Clearly she's above being on the ground. Fucking ornery cunt.
rarityfigurine.furniture_look_desc: You can sense brony vibes in this room.

pinkiepiefigurine.str_desc: It's an MLP figure. You may be hallucinating but its voice keeps speaking inside your head.
pinkiepiefigurine.furniture_place_desc: You set Pinkie Pie up on the sill and try to suppress the voices in your head.
pinkiepiefigurine.furniture_look_desc: You sense Ponk in the room.

twilightsparklefigurine.str_desc: It's an MLP figure. This one talks big about friendship but has a dragon indentured servant for like the whole show. What a hypocrite!
twilightsparklefigurine.furniture_place_desc: You place Twilight on the bookshelf. Not that she would enjoy the kind of swill you read.
twilightsparklefigurine.furniture_look_desc: You can sense brony vibes in this room.

mylittleponyfigurine.furniture_place_desc: You place a horse figurine on the windowsill.
mylittleponyfigurine.furniture_look_desc: You can sense brony vibes in this room.

hatstand.str_desc: A hat stand is by the door.
hatstand.furniture_place_desc: You prop the hat stand up and hang whatever hats you can find on top.
hatstand.furniture_look_desc: A hat stand sits near the door.

recordplayer.str_desc: An antique gramophone from the 1930s. It normally plays vinyl, but through the power of slime, CDs work just as well.
recordplayer.furniture_place_desc: You place the ol' boy on the floor.
recordplayer.furniture_look_desc: An old record player sits on the floor.

keg.str_desc: You managed to buy an entire keg of high proof liquor without even needing to show ID. NLACakaNM is the best city in the world.
keg.furniture_place_desc: You take a swig out of the keg and haphazardly roll it across the room. That'll do.
keg.furniture_look_desc: The keg in the room looks dulled and dented. Standard, almost.

slimecityflag.str_desc: There's nothing like the good old stars n' slugs to bring a tear to an old patriot's eye.
slimecityflag.furniture_place_desc: You hang the flag on your wall and sing the anthem aloud to yourself.
slimecityflag.furniture_look_desc: The NLACakaNM flag hangs proudly on the wall.

slimecityconfederateflag.str_desc: It's an alternate flag design the Rowdys pull out during civil wars. Long live the motherfucking south.
slimecityconfederateflag.furniture_place_desc: Shit, let's be Robert E. Lee. You confirm your support of the Confederacy by flying the flag outside your window.
slimecityconfederateflag.furniture_look_desc: The NLACakaNM Confederate flag hangs defiantly on your wall.

slimeoidhouse.str_desc: It's a little hutch for your slimeoid to stay in. It's only knee high though, so it looks like the big ones are SOL.
slimeoidhouse.furniture_place_desc: You have to place the slimehouse inside so that it doesn't get caught in any drive-bys. Looks pretty cozy anyway.
slimeoidhouse.furniture_look_desc: Your slimeoid just loves that slimehouse you set up.

humancorpse.str_desc: It's a fresh cadaver, stitched together with the bits and bobs you find regularly on the street. What a find!
humancorpse.furniture_place_desc: You open the bodybag you've been lugging around and splay the corpse out on it. You're no expert on feng shui, but if Martha Stewart saw this, she would probably run the fuck away. Out of jealousy.
humancorpse.furniture_look_desc: There's a dead body in here.

reanimatedcorpse.str_desc: It's a stitched cadaver you found, reanimated with someone's immortal soul. It cannot speak, but it's obedient enough regardless.
reanimatedcorpse.furniture_place_desc: You tell your thrall to kneel over there in the corner. They know what they did.
reanimatedcorpse.furniture_look_desc: A Frankenstein-like creature is chilling in here.

medievaltorturedevice.str_desc: It's an old-style torture machine. This one is called 'The Rack' and you use it to stretch someone until their spine begs for mercy. It usually doesn't work well on slimeoids, what with their amorphous bodies, so somebody retrofitted it with a hot plate on the seat cushion.
medievaltorturedevice.furniture_place_desc: You assemble the torture device and do a couple of test cranks. Putting it together was a bitch and a half because the instructions were in Old English.
medievaltorturedevice.furniture_look_desc: A torture rack is installed in here.

blackvelvetsofa.str_desc: It's a sleek, luxurious couch adorned with platinum studded black velvet. They say only the most criminally prone Italians could ever hope to afford its mafioso charm.
blackvelvetsofa.furniture_place_desc: You threaten a random pedestrian with death to get him to move your couch in. That's just how you operate.
blackvelvetsofa.furniture_look_desc: A black velvet couch adds style to this place.

blackvelvetbed.str_desc: It's a stylish black velvet bed frame with a stark white mattress and bedspread. It's seductive, even without a leggy dame lying on it.
blackvelvetbed.furniture_place_desc: You assemble the bed and lie down for awhile. No fishes here. You're sleeping with the gods. Er, goddesses. Whatever.
blackvelvetbed.furniture_look_desc: A black velvet bed is in the bedroom.

blackvelvetchair.str_desc: It's a studded velvet chair. It doesn't get more executive than this baby.
blackvelvetchair.furniture_place_desc: You slide the chair to the corner, Man, you're going to look so menacing in this thing.
blackvelvetchair.furniture_look_desc: A black velvet chair is set up.

blackvelvettable.str_desc: It's an antique table adorned with studs and velvet. Tailor made for deal making.
blackvelvettable.furniture_place_desc: You set the table up, and place upon it the finest silverware you have.
blackvelvettable.furniture_look_desc: A black velvet table is set up.

blackvelvetlamp.str_desc: It's a mahogany lamp with velvet lampshade. It gives you excellent mood lighting.
blackvelvetlamp.furniture_place_desc: You plug the lamp in. Odd. Normally you prefer to put people's lights out.
blackvelvetlamp.furniture_look_desc: A black velvet lamp casts bright lights and long shadows.

popeonarope.str_desc: It's Pope Francis, hung and dead on a noose. At the very least it's a convincing imitation.
popeonarope.furniture_place_desc: You get on a chair and hang the noose from the ceiling. The lightly swinging Pope now adds an ambient wood creaking noise to your abode.
popeonarope.furniture_look_desc: Pope Francis hangs dead from the ceiling.

slimecorpchair.str_desc: It's a sleek green seat-like device outfitted for maximum comfort. Comes with built-in cupholders and a state of the art subliminal media player.
slimecorpchair.furniture_place_desc: As you attempt to pick up the heavy chair, you accidentally press a button on its underside. Suddenly, you pass out on the floor. When you wake up, the chair is set up like it had always been there.
slimecorpchair.furniture_look_desc: A futuristic Slimecorp chair is set up.

slimecorpcouch.str_desc: This SlimeCorp:tm: Mega Sofa is capable of extending in 3 directions. It's perfect for throwing house parties with all your friends:tm:!
slimecorpcouch.furniture_place_desc: You notice a 'MOVE IN' button under the upholstery of your couch. After pressing it, the couch grows metal limbs, forcibly grabbing you and walking into your apartment complex. You're sure that neat feature won't bite you in the ass later.
slimecorpcouch.furniture_look_desc: A futuristic Slimecorp couch sits along the wall.

slimecorpbed.str_desc: This SlimeCorp:tm: Safety Bed is the ultimate resting place for whenever you need physical protection! We at SlimeCorp can't guarantee your safety without one! Be sure to try out its cryogenic stasis feature!
slimecorpbed.furniture_place_desc: Somehow, assembling this fully functional cryostasis container was easier than the ones you used to build from IKEA.
slimecorpbed.furniture_look_desc: A Slimecorp twin bed/cryo pod is in the bedroom.

slimecorpdesk.str_desc: The Slimecorp:tm: Submission Desk is the ultimate tool in building charisma and acclimating yourself to the times! Simply keep your head down and you'll be ahead of the game for when you all submit to us.
slimecorpdesk.furniture_place_desc: You decided to place the desk by carrying it on your back like a hopeless thrall. That's the spirit!
slimecorpdesk.furniture_look_desc: A Slimecorp desk made for submission is in a dark corner.

slimecorplamp.str_desc: The Slimecorp:tm: Talkative Strobe Light is an excellent way to memorize interesting facts about SlimeCorp:tm: Tired of our email advertisements? You can absorb all that information lickety split through our state of the art subliminal messages.
slimecorplamp.furniture_place_desc: SUBMIT TO SLIMECORP. NOW, PLUG IN THE LAMP WHILE SUBMITTING TO SLIMECORP.
slimecorplamp.furniture_look_desc: A Slimecorp lamp is flashing some neat subliminal messages throughout the room.

sord.furniture_place_desc: You place the SORD indoors so it doesn't escape to the side.
sord.furniture_look_desc: dude. therps a SORD over therew.re.

pileofmysteriouspowder.str_desc: The guy you bought this fine white powder from called it nose candy. What a fucking idiot. Everybody knows you eat candy with your mouth.
pileofmysteriouspowder.furniture_place_desc: You unpack the powder and pour it all out in a nice little pile. Whoa. Feelin' kind of woozy.
pileofmysteriouspowder.furniture_look_desc: There's a pile of powdery substance in a dark alcove over yonder.

alarmclock.str_desc: The annoying sound this thing makes perfectly explains why the bazaar sells so many broken clocks.
alarmclock.furniture_place_desc: You set the alarm clock on your nightstand. Nobody knows why.

lavalamp.str_desc: It's one of those lamps where you stick colorful boiling chemicals under heat and pour them on shitty guests. At least you're pretty sure that's what it does. The container is sealed with a bottle cap and everything!
lavalamp.furniture_place_desc: You plug the lava lamp in and wait for the cool bubbles to start going. It's taking too long, though, so you stop.
lavalamp.furniture_look_desc: A lava lamp is plugged in.

discoball.str_desc: It's a large ball covered in tiny mirror surfaces. Good for dancers and epileptics.
discoball.furniture_place_desc: You hang the gitterball and give it a hefty spin.
discoball.furniture_look_desc: A disco ball hangs from the ceiling.

shagcarpet.str_desc: Wall to wall shag carpeting with a soft, hot pink texture to it. Very retro, and well loved by furries with inexplicable floor fetishes.
shagcarpet.furniture_place_desc: You roll out the new carpet and do some shag angels.
shagcarpet.furniture_look_desc: The hot pink carpeting feels soft beneath your feet.

stainedglasswindows.str_desc: A number of windows painstakingly crafted to build a mosaic. Looks breakable.
stainedglasswindows.furniture_place_desc: You carefully install the stained glass fixtures. Who knew you were such a good carpenter?
stainedglasswindows.furniture_look_desc: The windows are made of stained glass.

customdoor.furniture_place_desc: You break the original door off its hinges and install a new one.
customdoor.furniture_look_desc: The door is modded with a {custom} design.

expiredbottleofrogaine.str_desc: It's a bottle of hair growth solution. Whoever owns this must be a longtime bald person.
expiredbottleofrogaine.furniture_place_desc: You drop the bottle of rogaine in plain sight.
expiredbottleofrogaine.furniture_look_desc: There's an old Rogaine bottle lying around.

custombed.str_desc: It's a {custom} themed bed. Ooh, cozy.
custombed.furniture_place_desc: You assemble the bed and lop the mattress on top.
custombed.furniture_look_desc: There's a {custom} bed in the bedroom.

customflag.str_desc: It's the illustrious {custom} flag. You salute it with reckless abandon.
customflag.furniture_place_desc: You fly the flag outside the window.
customflag.furniture_look_desc: A {custom} flag flies outside the window.

brick.str_desc: It's a brick. Can't build with it, can't eat it. All you can do is throw it through someone's window.
brick.furniture_place_desc: You go outside your house and throw a brick through your window. Nobody can ever say you're a fake vandal now.
brick.furniture_look_desc: Somebody threw a brick through the window.

shittychair.str_desc: It's a handmade chair. It's so completely botched that you wonder if you can even sit in it.
shittychair.furniture_place_desc: You develop several pre-infected splinters just taking this out of your inventory. Fearing another bout of tetanus, you gently toss the chair on the ground.
shittychair.furniture_look_desc: There's a chair-like pile of plywood set up.

shittydesk.str_desc: This desk fucking sucks. It is an insult to the very concept of a flat surface.
shittydesk.furniture_place_desc: After moving the desk into place, you try to sit down and write the next great American zine. The paper gets destroyed by it the moment you start.
shittydesk.furniture_look_desc: There's a desk in here. Don't sit on it.

shittybench.str_desc: It's a handmade wooden bench Looking at its detailed design, torture device manufacturers should've hired you ages ago.
shittybench.furniture_place_desc: You try to move the couch in yourself. As you try, the couch snaps in two. However, it's actually more comfortable this way, so you leave it as is.
shittybench.furniture_look_desc: There's a...bench in here? Sorry, I couldn't tell if that thing qualifies.

shittybed.str_desc: It's a dusty pile of broken planks and springs. Wait did the item title say it was a bed? Fuck no. Don't pay attention to that.
shittybed.furniture_place_desc: You try to assemble the bed, which in this case would probably involve breaking it down to bits and hoping sawdust is soft enough to sleep on.
shittybed.furniture_look_desc: There's a death bed in the bedroom.

woodenvuvuzela.str_desc: You tried carving an ornate wooden clarinet, but you botched it. This dime-a-dozen consolation prize sounds like an elephant shitting out its organs.
woodenvuvuzela.furniture_place_desc: You set your vuvuzela on the shelf. Carnegie Hall, see you never.
woodenvuvuzela.furniture_look_desc: There's a shitty vuvuzela here. Fuck.

ornatechair.str_desc: It's an immaculately carved wooden chair. It looks rustic, and must've cost a fortune.
ornatechair.furniture_place_desc: You carefully set the chair down. Wouldn't want to scratch the varnish on it, now.
ornatechair.furniture_look_desc: There's an immaculate -*HUE*- chair set up.

ornatedesk.str_desc: It's a posh looking old-style desk. The legs have some neat etchings along the side.
ornatedesk.furniture_place_desc: You carry the desk to the wall, and step back to admire it.
ornatedesk.furniture_look_desc: There's an -*HUE*- ornate looking desk in the corner.

ornatebench.str_desc: The bench is so well-constructed, people forget it's made of uncomfortable unapholstered hardwood.
ornatebench.furniture_place_desc: You promise several art buyers they can look at your bench if they can help carry it to your flat. Once moved, you kick them out swiftly, and without regret.
ornatebench.furniture_look_desc: There's a wonderful -*HUE*- colored bench against the wall.

ornatebed.str_desc: This antique looking bed makes you feel like a tyrant. A whittling tyrant.
ornatebed.furniture_place_desc: You had a lot of trouble finding a mattress worthy of this frame. Time to put em' together.
ornatebed.furniture_look_desc: A bed with a -*HUE*- bedspread is in the bedroom.

craftsmansclarinet.str_desc: It's a handmade clarinet. Mmm. Sounds real nice.
craftsmansclarinet.furniture_place_desc: You gently set the clarinet on your shelf. You wish you bought a case for it.
craftsmansclarinet.furniture_look_desc: A clarinet sits on your shelf.

solidpoudringuitar.str_desc: An electric guitar whose body is built entirely out of condensed poudrins. Heavy as a meteorite, too.
solidpoudringuitar.furniture_place_desc: You gently drop the guitar to set it down. Whoops. Guess Slimecorp gets to pay for that little dent in the floor.
solidpoudringuitar.furniture_look_desc: A poudrin guitar is lying against the wall.

fishbonexylophone.str_desc: It's a carefully carved mbila-style xylophone made out of fish. You'd think it would smell, but not really.
fishbonexylophone.furniture_place_desc: You roll the instrument in and play a few notes. Nice. Ripe as the sea.
fishbonexylophone.furniture_look_desc: A fish xylophone is in here, mallets strewn about.

beastskindrums.str_desc: A trap set built out of the remains of fallen secreatures. The cymbals were once a dino pelvis, so that's pretty neat.
beastskindrums.furniture_place_desc: You assemble each piece into your place drum by drum. As you do your neighbors start to look pretty nervous. Ahaha.
beastskindrums.furniture_look_desc: There's a Stone Age looking drum set in here.

gourdmaracas.str_desc: A neat little shaker made from a gourd and some dried vegetables. Finally, you can show off your Mexican heritage!
gourdmaracas.furniture_place_desc: You do a little maraca dance while nobody's watching and quickly toss them out of sight.
gourdmaracas.furniture_look_desc: Gourd maracas are sitting on the shelf.

saxophone.furniture_place_desc: You lean your saxophone up against the wall
saxophone.furniture_look_desc: A saxophone is leaning against the wall.

cornet.str_desc: A trumpet built of metal corn stalks. It's full of dents from all the times you dropped it or bumped it into a wall. You can't believe a juvenile delinquent was capable of forging this.
cornet.furniture_place_desc: You set the trumpet bell first on the ground.
cornet.furniture_look_desc: A banged up trumpet is on the floor.

trombone.str_desc: A trombone forged in farm-grown steel and brass. Trombone slides work best lubricated with slime.
trombone.furniture_place_desc: You set the trombone down. It's really annoying how its odd shape always leaves it tilted.
trombone.furniture_look_desc: A trombone sits awkwardly on the floor.
